name: Cognitive Bias
definition: Systematic error in thinking that occurs when people are processing and interpreting information in the world around them and affects the decisions and judgments that they make
:LABEL: Category

name: Belief-decision-making and behavioral
definition: Bias that affects belief formation or reasoning processes or business and economic decisions or human behavior in general
:LABEL: Domain

name: Memory
definition: Bias that either enhances or impairs the recall of a memory-either the chances that the memory will be recalled at all or the amount of time it takes for it to be recalled-or both
:LABEL: Domain

name: Social
definition: Bias that relates to people and perceptions of themselves or others or the ways that they behave or act and reach decisions as a group
:LABEL: Domain
